code: @SuppressForbidden(reason = "manipulates system properties for testing") public void testPathHome() throws Exception {     final String pathHome = System.getProperty("es.path.home").     final String value = randomAlphaOfLength(16).     System.setProperty("es.path.home", value).     runTest(ExitCodes.OK, true, output -> {     }, (foreground, pidFile, quiet, esSettings) -> {         Settings settings = esSettings.settings().         assertThat(settings.size(), equalTo(2)).         assertEquals(value, settings.get("path.home")).         // added by env initialization         assertTrue(settings.keySet().contains("path.logs")).     }).     System.clearProperty("es.path.home").     final String commandLineValue = randomAlphaOfLength(16).     runTest(ExitCodes.OK, true, output -> {     }, (foreground, pidFile, quiet, esSettings) -> {         Settings settings = esSettings.settings().         assertThat(settings.size(), equalTo(2)).         assertEquals(commandLineValue, settings.get("path.home")).         // added by env initialization         assertTrue(settings.keySet().contains("path.logs")).     }, "-Epath.home=" + commandLineValue).     if (pathHome != null)         System.setProperty("es.path.home", pathHome).     else         System.clearProperty("es.path.home"). }
